items.content_html: This project is a simple full-stack user authentication system built with React on the frontend and Express.js with SQLite3 on the backend. It includes features like user registration, login, hashed passwords, error handling, and show/hide password toggle. SQLite3 is used as a lightweight, file-based database ‚Äî no external database setup required.
items.title: Srinithi2905/Auth-System: This project is a simple full-stack user authentication system built with React on the frontend and Express.js with SQLite3 on the backend. It includes features like user registration, login, hashed passwords, error handling, and show/hide password toggle. SQLite3 is used as a lightweight, file-based database ‚Äî no external database setup required.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
